name: Digital Spy Forums Grand Dizzy (Blue bars)
description: This style is identical to my "White bars" style, except the bars between each post are blue.
additional_info:
I now have three styles. Install them all and see which is your favourite:

Digital Spy Forums Grand Dizzy (Blue bars)
Digital Spy Forums Grand Dizzy (White bars)
Digital Spy Forums Grand Dizzy (Classic)

These styles were made to fix the problem of the gloomy grey redesign to the Digital Spy forums, in the hope the admins will see these styles and admit it looks better with a bit of colour. This is all done with the greatest of respect to Digital Spy and their design team.

Many thanks to Freecyber who kindly supplied the code to make this possible. And thanks to my Lord Jesus the Messiah who died and rose again to save sinners like me from our evil ways and give eternal life.

Love,
Grand Dizzy :)
